website_summaries.verdict: Subtle, elegant styling defines Puma Astro Cup Suede shoes. The on-trend look and comfortable feel compare very well to the Puma Liga Suede which is no mean feat. Perfect fit, true-to-size length, lightweight feel, interesting colors, and a low price point make for highly coveted kicks.A few minor things hold these back, however. The red colorway looks burgundy in person, and the sneakers have thin tongues which might be an issue for someone who needs more padding. Overall, however, the advantages are stacked high for this model.
pros: The Puma Astro Cup Suede sneakers have a subtly elegant look that is typical of most retro styles, most users stated
Many reviewers commented that these Puma low-tops are a very comfortable alternative to the Squash 2000s or the Liga Suede
A good number of testers were genuinely pleased to find that the Astro Cup Suede sneakers provided a perfect fit and ran true to size
They say there is no rubbing in any area of the shoes whatsoever
Several praised the low pricing of the low-top casual kicks
They added that with the Puma Astro Cup Suede, you get quality shoes without breaking the bank
A significant number of purchasers said they highly recommended the sneakers for people who liked subtle but interesting colors
Some consumers remarked that the Puma Astro Cup Suede shoes feel lightweight
They also liked how well the shoes’ uppers hugged the feet
The soles of these lifestyle sneakers provide a decent grip, one customer commented
cons: A few people reported that the red colorway of the Puma Astro Cup Suede is more burgundy or wine in person than real red
According to one individual, the low-top sneakers have very thin tongues
One person complained that the Puma Astro Cup Suede provides very little in the way of arch support
He added that this made the shoes more ideal for casual adventures rather than heavy use or extended times on the feet

customer_reviews.title: Bought twice, don't fit.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. I like the style and the feel but I'm disappointed by the incorrect size. I'ma 10 1/2 in shoe size, ordered and waited 3-4 just to find that its too small. Returned, waited 9 days, ordered and waited 3 additional days and just today recieved it to find that it's SMALL. I went from a 10 1/2 to an 11 and I'm not planning on buying an 11.5 but we'll see. I suggest you get 2 sizes from what you normally wear, I'm honestly too disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Terrible knockoffs
customer_reviews.text: These shoes did not have the puma quality that I know. While I’m no expert, I definitely believe these are either fakes or a batch that failed quality inspections. Here’s why... *The item description claims these are made from suede leather but nowhere on the shoe or box content labels did it indicate that. *The stitching on the signature puma stripe was all wonky rather than neat & straight *The insole was flimsy & not adhered to the shoe Returned them immediately. I purchased a pair of classic pumas earlier this year from Zappos & didn’t have any issues with those.
customer_reviews.author: Makarios

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value fennel
customer_reviews.text: Pumas are my summer staples on those days or occasions when I'm wearing shorts and sandals just won't cut it; grab a pair of no show socks and you're good to go the distance. These Astros are also better looking than my previous pair of Brazils; if they last as long I'll come out on the winning side given they were quite a bit cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a deal!👍
customer_reviews.text: I bought my son another pair of Pumas on here and he loves them! Then I saw these! They are very similar, not quite as nice as the others but for $30? What a deal! He wears these for work and the others to go out with friends. Go a half size to a full size up, as we found out after ordering the first pair Pumas run small!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Petersen

customer_reviews.title: SAMBA Fans line up
customer_reviews.text: Course not as heavy and 'true' as the original samba (what Adidas makes today is an embarrassment), but Puma has put out a darn good shoe for tooling about....looking good. Original (ironically)....and the walking barefoot feel. very good job Puma......now don't rerelease it in 2 years and replace the suede.
customer_reviews.author: PT mullen

customer_reviews.title: Puma Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: I love Puma, they have the low sole shoes that I love and these are a perfect fit for my wide D size feet and very stylish! I have no arches and wearing sneakers with a high sole just hurts and throws me off like I'm trying to walk in stilettos. Puma keeps me moving! Great fit, style and price!
customer_reviews.author: Drumatar75

customer_reviews.title: Recommend Buy
customer_reviews.text: Genuine Puma shoes, prefect sizing, colors as seen in image, recommended purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Husband loved so much bought a pair for myself
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband, they look great on him and he loves them. I'm back checking them out to buy a pair for myself too! Great all black option. I used to have the blackouts back in the day and these are a close match.

customer_reviews.title: They are super comfortable and comparable to Adidas Gazelles
customer_reviews.text: These are my first pair of Puma sneakers. They are super comfortable and comparable to Adidas Gazelles. I've received many compliments when I've worn them. Strangely though, I noticed that the red dye started bleeding into the Achilles heel white part of the sneaker, even though they have never got wet.

customer_reviews.title: 100% as expected!
customer_reviews.text: To start, it was guaranteed 2 day delivery but, you know, weather can be fickle! But I was immediately alerted to the delay and given a new target date. So the communication is spot. On. The shoe came in the box, wrapped in tissue paper, still stuffed! Very good shipping condition. Got them as an anniversary gift for boyfriend and as soon as they were on he was into it they fit well and look great. Will definitely buy again when ready.

customer_reviews.title: Fits very small, much less than the size you are prdering

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Astro Cup Sneaker
product_meta.description: The astro cup is a new football inspired court style. With its soft suede upper with t-toe vamp design, it achieves a classic timeless look. The rubber tooling ensures grip and visually appeals through ist rich textures. The style comes with a brand new comfort insock, featuring a stylish debossed design on top of a superior foam.A clean and dressy football sneaker
